website_summaries.verdict: This versatile handheld cleaner can go from polishing shoes to handbags to leather furniture with little more than the change of a brush.
pros: Can be used on all leather goods such as footwear, luggage and bags, furniture, and other items
Comes with brushes for polishing and buffing
Used to clean baseboards and other non-leather goods
cons: Some find the handheld device does not have enough power

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with variety of items in the package
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe polisher, I like the Rechargeable battery, seems to be enough for what I use to polish and clean leather shoes. The extra package items are also good to have. Convenient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Starr Z

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: The motor is very weak. No instructions on what piece is for what use. What a waste of money. Just go old school and do it manual. You'll get a better result.
customer_reviews.author: zaidaespi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Definitely worth buying if you have a lot of leather shoes, boots, and jackets
customer_reviews.author: Tiana

customer_reviews.title: All Inclusive and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love how convenient it is and how easy it is to change out all of the brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: The BEST shoe shine kit I've ever used !
customer_reviews.text: My ex-wife went to sunny Florida for 7 or 8 weeks. She has over 100 pair of shoes. I tried to clean them up by hand but gave up after 15 or 20 pair. I checked with Amazon and found the machine. WOW It did take me over 5 hours but I did OVER 70 pair of shoes ! I had to buy polish a few times but the shoes look BRAND NEW ! Thank you. Bob Darling West Warwick , R.I.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Darling

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I got the product quickly and it works fine for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big time saver
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, I have no problems with applying just the right amount of pressure I need for buffing and best of all it saves me a lot of time.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Wing

customer_reviews.title: Buy disposable sponge applicators instead
customer_reviews.text: This is only useful for applying polish. It is not strong enough to actually shine. And since you can’t easily replace the heads it is essentially disposable.
customer_reviews.author: Urban, C.
